text: @SpeakerPelosi USA is not the world police. Talk to china about pollution... You know the country. You allowed all OUR JOBS TO GO THERE FOR CHEAP POLLUTED MANUFACTURING. oh yeah and covid19 POORLUCY is a pile of 🤡💩
